revisionDesc.change: Proofreading Corrections: Heyde dates and Silent Proof
Clean encoding (editor, date, remove "_large") and add standard annotations on unannotated files (Jeff W, Martha [Mattie], George W, Lou Haslam)

body.p:
i received your letter to day with the nice envelopes all stampd stamped so nicely i feel as if i ougth ought to write a nice letter the first that i saw of those stamped enpelopesenvelopes i dident didn't know whether they were the lawful or bogus ones i sent Edd next door when Mr ray kept a jewelery jewelry store to get some and he got those and i was so green i had to ask georgeGeorge if they would go and to tease me he told me letters wouldent wouldn't go with them envelopes i told him i gave 4 cent a peice piece for them and they ought to be good then he said he gessd guessed theyed they'd go i am glad to hear you have been so well this summer walterWalter it is quite warm here and terribly dusty i am in hopes it will rain as it has the appearance of it georgeGeorge has been to the country for three days he went up in the glen cove boat to roslin Roslynn and went out sailing and fishing and had a pretty good time i believe whethe whether his gal went with him or not i dont don't know he got back sunday Sunday
night and is inspecting on the small pipe to day as the large has not come yet he and mrMr. Lane seems to get along very well jeffyJeffy wrote to me after he was home that georgeGeorge would not be discharged as long as mrMr. Lane was there georgeGeorge might save something i think if he was saving but these bad gals and amusements takes the green he s he's saving enoughf enough toward me i know i dont don't know how he would be if you didint didn't send me so much but i think i shouldent shouldn't get along so well if i depended altogether on him) O waltWalt i feel sometimes like the irishIrish when you give em any thing they always say long may you live and be blessed) but i dont don't know as i ought to complain of georgeGeorge he dont don't know how much it takes to keep house he is very good to me so long as i dont don't interfere with his affairs) the house is getting along very well they are putting up the stairs now so you dident didn't like your new place as well as the old one well a person will get attached to any place where they live a long time)

i am pretty well now i have been troubled with a pain in my side but i put mustard on and it is better but very sore) walterWalter dear if you send me a money order next week i wish you would put a dollar in with it

postscript.p: i am glad you have set the time to come
i think the prices must be in the country as i havent haven't seen them lately
